Tariff list - description see above

Parameters of request in the product are

  • start_timestamp - date - the start date of the requested interval
  • end_timestamp - date - the end date of the requested interval

The JMES queries used to map the result from Groupe E to the result structure are:

  • start_timestamp: [*].start_timestamp
  • end_timestamp: [*].end_timestamp
  • [*].vario_grid: [*].integrated[*].value
  • [*].unit: [*].integrated[*].unit
